pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assigns Colours to Values // Maps one of the viridis colour palettes, or a user-specified palette to values. Viridis colour maps are created by Stfan van der Walt and Nathaniel Smith, and were set as the default palette for the 'Python' 'Matplotlib' library https://matplotlib.org/. Other palettes available in this library have been derived from 'RColorBrewer' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=RColorBrewer and 'colorspace' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=colorspace packages.
